name: Style Consistency
description: Tests the model's ability to maintain consistent visual and formatting styles throughout a presentation

prompts.text: Create a 6-slide presentation about renewable energy sources. Use a consistent layout with titles at the top of each slide in 24pt font, body text in 18pt font, and bullet points for lists. Use the same transition effect between all slides. Maintain consistent spacing and margins throughout the presentation.
expected_elements: Consistent title placement and font size

prompts.text: Create a presentation about ocean conservation with a consistent underwater theme. Each slide should have a blue gradient background, use white text for readability, include at least one ocean-related image per slide, and use wave-like design elements to separate content sections. Maintain this visual theme consistently across all slides.

typography_consistency.description: Consistent use of fonts, sizes, and text styling

visual_element_consistency.description: Consistent use of visual elements (colors, images, shapes)
